returns.bundleHashes: Array of bundle hashes for that block

params.bidPaid: Actual bid amount to charge (may be less than bid)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

registerSearcher().details: Requires deposit that is refundable upon unregistration

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.bundleHash: Hash of the bundle (keccak256 of bundle data)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

andeToken().notice: ANDE token contract for bid payments

blockBundles(uint256,uint256).notice: Block number => bundle hashes submitted for that block

getBlockBundles(uint256).notice: Get bundles for a specific block

markBundleExecuted(bytes32,uint256,uint2.notice: Mark bundle as executed (called by sequencer)

markBundleRejected(bytes32,string).notice: Mark bundle as rejected (called by sequencer)

minimumBid().notice: Minimum bid amount in ANDE tokens

sequencer().notice: Sequencer address authorized to execute bundles

submitBundle(bytes32,uint256,uint256).notice: Submit bundle commitment (off-chain bundle, on-chain commitment)

unregisterSearcher().notice: Unregister as searcher and refund deposit
